MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 5.12PM in the SY10 postcode area of Morton following reports of a damaged piece of overhead line equipment. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.45PM on 12th December 2020.
